data.name: txtImzalananSql.Text
data.value:
select * from ( select co.id, 0 as sec, efatura, co.faturano, "CO" as tip, co.tarih as faturatarihi, co.toplam-co.kdv as aratoplam, co.kdv, co.iskonto, co.toplam as geneltoplam, co.yevmiyefisno, co.unvan1, co.vergidairesi, co.vergino, eb.guid, eb.efaturasekli from checkoutfatura as co right join efaturabilgi as eb on eb.faturatipi="CO" and eb.faturaid=co.id where efatura>1 /*sorguco*/
union all
select af.id, 0 as sec, efatura, af.faturano, "AF" as tip, af.tarih as faturatarihi, af.toplam as aratoplam, af.kdv, af.iskonto, af.geneltoplam, af.yevmiyefisno, af.unvan1, af.vergidairesi, af.vergino, eb.guid, eb.efaturasekli from acentafatura as af right join efaturabilgi as eb on eb.faturatipi="AF" and eb.faturaid=af.id where efatura>1 /*sorguaf*/
union all
select sf.id, 0 as sec, efatura, sf.faturano,"SF" as tip, sf.tarih as faturatarihi, sf.toplam as aratoplam, sf.kdv, sf.iskonto, sf.geneltoplam, sf.fisno as yevmiyefisno, sf.unvan1, sf.vergidairesi, sf.vergino, eb.guid, eb.efaturasekli from sifatura as sf right join efaturabilgi as eb on eb.faturatipi="SF" and eb.faturaid=sf.id where efatura>1 /*sorgusi*/
union all
select cf.id, 0 as sec, efatura, cf.faturano,"CF" as tip, cf.tarih as faturatarihi, cf.toplam as aratoplam, cf.kdv, cf.iskonto, cf.geneltoplam, cf.fisno as yevmiyefisno, cf.unvan1, cf.vergidairesi, cf.vergino, eb.guid, eb.efaturasekli from carifatura as cf right join efaturabilgi as eb on eb.faturatipi="CF" and eb.faturaid=cf.id where efatura>1 /*sorgucf*/
union all
select adf.id, 0 as sec, efatura, adf.faturano,"AG" as tip, adf.tarih as faturatarihi, adf.aratoplam, adf.kdv, adf.iskonto, adf.geneltoplam, adf.fisno yevmiyefisno, adf.unvan1, adf.vergi_dairesi, adf.vergi_no, eb.guid, eb.efaturasekli from adisyonfaturasi as adf right join efaturabilgi as eb on eb.faturatipi="" and eb.faturaid=adf.id where efatura>1 /*sorguag*/ ) as f order by faturano desc

data.name: txtImzalanacakSql.Text
data.value:
select * from ( select 0 as sec,id,faturano,"CO" as tip,tarih as faturatarihi,toplam-kdv as aratoplam, kdv,iskonto,toplam as geneltoplam,yevmiyefisno,unvan1,vergidairesi,vergino from checkoutfatura where efatura=1 /*sorguco*/
union all
select 0 as sec,id,faturano,"AF" as tip,tarih as faturatarihi,toplam as aratoplam, kdv,iskonto, geneltoplam,yevmiyefisno,unvan1,vergidairesi,vergino from acentafatura where efatura=1 /*sorguaf*/
union all
select 0 as sec,id,faturano,"SF" as tip,tarih as faturatarihi,toplam as aratoplam, kdv,iskonto,geneltoplam,fisno as yevmiyefisno,unvan1,vergidairesi,vergino from sifatura where efatura=1 /*sorgusi*/
union all
select 0 as sec, id,faturano,"CF" as tip,tarih as faturatarihi,toplam as aratoplam, kdv,iskonto,geneltoplam,fisno as yevmiyefisno,unvan1,vergidairesi,vergino from carifatura where efatura=1 /*sorgucf*/
union all
select 0 as sec, id,faturano,"AG" as tip,tarih as faturatarihi,aratoplam, kdv,iskonto,geneltoplam,fisno yevmiyefisno,unvan1,vergi_dairesi,vergi_no from adisyonfaturasi where efatura=1 /*sorguag*/ ) as f order by id
